1.1.0.name: wordpress/statpress-dashboard-widget-lite
1.1.0.description:
Real time stats from StatPress for your Wordpress Dashboard - Lite-Version - much smaller and faster. Based on the original StatPress Widget by Daniele Lippi.

Features

  • much smaller and faster - only the key facts
  • no slowing, design-burning graph
  • fits also on 3-column view
  • just install and place the widget on your dashboard
